Description: Shoulder sherd (mended from two fragments) of Milesian Fikellura pottery oinochoe; interior reserved; exterior, white slip; frieze of painted tongues with line below.
Curator's comments: The sherd belongs to the same vessel as British Museum 1886,0401.779 (B102.4) as Cook suggested.
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (12, no. 1)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GF.139)
Schlotzhauer 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus Naukratis (p. 131-2, Nau 97, pl. 21h)
